Tender Title: CPU4070-Air Handling Plant and Air Conditioning Geothermal Heat Pumps R & M
Tender Description:
Nottingham City Council is seeking tenders from suitably qualified and experienced entities to provide the following:

- Planned Maintenance and Remedial Works

- Reactive Maintenance

- Delivery of minor improvement works

for

i) Air Conditioning

ii) Air Handling

iii) Air Source Heat Pumps

iv) Chiller Units

v) Kitchen Fans and Extraction

vi) Geothermal Heat Pump
Classification Description: Architectural, construction, engineering and inspection services
